column1: full on leg, and he presses forward to drive to long-on. Off the mark
nice start! Full outside off, and he tries to drive away from his body. Takes a thick outside edge, and races past short third man

oh, dear! Imad has the last laugh! Very soft dismissal. Full on leg, and he tries to clip it over square leg. Can't clear the infield, and taken comfortably by the man inside the circle. A nothing shot
tossed up on off, and he whips an on-drive to long on for a walking single
full on leg, and he tries to drive. But he's through the shot too early, and mistimed to the leg side
shotttt! Length ball on off, and Fakhar backs away slightly and cuts super-hard through the off side!
length ball on middle, and he mistimes a leg-side swipe to midwicket
drilled! Length ball, just outside off, and he crunches a punch past the diving cover fielder! Rides the bounce well
length ball, angling inwards. And nudged off the back foot to midwicket
length ball, just outside off, and he tries to cut square. Mistimed to point
length ball on off, and sliding inwards. Tries to muscle a shot to the leg side, but mistimes it to mid-on instead
back of a length on off, and tapped off the back foot to mid on
back of a length, outside leg stump, and he tried to whip over square leg. Misses, as the ball hits his body
back of a length, wide outside leg stump, and once again he misses the attempted leg-side whip. Ball hits his chest region
back of a length, on leg, and cramped for space. Mistimed to mid-on for a single
length ball on middle, and angling across. Tries to punch to mid off, and splices the shot to the fielder
Haris breaks free! Full on off, and he prods forward to meet the ball. Drives through the off side, and pierces the infield with perfection
back of a length on leg, and nudged off his hips to square leg
full on off, and he drives with the bat's closed face. Imad's at mid-on, but he misfields, which allows the batsmen to find the single
length ball, wide outside off, and tapped away from his body to the off side
length ball, wide outside off, and steered with the bat's open face to short third man
yorker on middle, and Fakhar backs away to dig this away to cover. They scamper across for one
full outside off, and what a beautiful lofted shot over mid-off! Leans forward, and offers his bat's full face
back of a length on off, and he ducks under this ball. Awkward bounce for the keeper, and that's a free run for the batting side
full on leg stump, and workd away to deep midwicket for a single
back of a length on leg stump, and he's cramped for space. Blocked off the back foot
full outside leg stump, and he makes room to whack towards the leg side. Inside-edged onto his boots as the ball rolls away to the keeper
back of a length on off, and slapped off the front foot to cover. Can't find the gap though
length ball, just outside leg, and he tries to nudge towards the leg side. But ball hits his body and rolls away to the leg side. Pressure building up here...
full outside leg stump, and whipped to short fine leg. They're taking a dangerous single and Haris would've been gone if there was a direct hit
full and wide outside off, and the attempted cover drive can't find the gap
full and wide outside off, and drilled through the off side! Point had no chance
length ball, just outside off, and tapped down to mid-on for a quick run
back of a length, just outside off, and he rides the bounce to defend off the back foot
back of a length just outside off, and he rides the bounce to tap it towards point
back of a length, just outside off, and pulled over midwicket! Picked the slower ball early
full on middle, and defended back to the batsman

big, big wicket! Full outside off, and Fakhar tries to skip down the wicket. Looks to muscle a shot over mid-off, but he slices it in the end. In the air for ages, and the fielder at point gets under it
full on off, and turning inwards. Looks to defend, but inside-edged onto his pads
dropped! Babar the fielder. How costly will this be? Full on off, and AB goes for the sweep. Babar goes for the 'reverse cup' style of catching, but the ball hits his palm and falls
length ball on off, and he mistimes a muscled pull to the leg side

full on off, and the offbreak turns away from Sohail as he presses forward to drive. Ball beats his bat, and keeper whips the bails off. Appeal for stumping but Haris' back-foot is inside the crease. An entertaining over
full just outside off, and pushed towards extra cover
full on middle, and he skips down the ground. Driven past Imad's right to long off
full on middle, and driven with the bat's open face. Stopped at cover
back of a length on off, and skidding inwards. Punched to cover, and AB wants the single. Haris doesn't respond, so AB needs to run back. Scampers back, dives full-length, and the dive has saved him.
length ball , just outside off, and he steers this off the front foot past short third man
length ball skidding into off stump. Punched off the back foot to cover
full on middle, and pushed away to the leg side. Too full for the batsman to get under it
Iftikhar has the golden arm! Length ball on off, and Haris backs away to cut. Ball stays low, and it's gone on to peg middle-stump back
full on off, and he stretches to the ball, before lap-sweeping to fine leg
length ball, just outside off, and tapped off the back foot to point
full on off, and tapped with soft hands to the vacant area near the leg side. Iftikhar gives the ball a chase and that's Lahore's fifty
full on off, and he presses forward to defend. Another tidy over from the 39-year-old offspinner
length ball, outside off, and turning inwards. Anderson gloves a shot away to the off side
full on off, and drilled to deep extra cover
length ball, lands outside off and turning further away. Punched to deep extra cover for one
full on off, and he meets the ball with the sweep. Protection behind square though
full on leg, and he clips this into the gap near wide long-on. Enough time to come back for the second
length ball, sliding in from off stump, and the cut-shot finds point. LQ: 55 for 3 after ten overs
carefully played. Full on middle, and tucked off his pads to deep midwicket
full outside off, and turning away. Cut off the back foot to deep point, and AB calls early for the second run
full on off, and he presses forward to block
full, just outside off, and driven away from his body to deep extra cover
full on off, and turning inwards. Defended to mid-on
oof! Whippage. Full on leg, and Anderson skips down the ground, before swiping this off his pads and over deep backward square!
length ball, wide outside off, but turning inwards. Cut off the back foot to point
another one! And this one is off the bat's middle. Full on off, and he clears his front leg, before muscling a leg-side slog over wide long-on
full on middle, and nudged off his toes to the leg side
Anderson's in the moooood! Goes for an expansive sweep, but gloves the ball through his legs, and through the keeper's legs too! Fine leg can't stop that
length ball on off, and he tries to cut. Under-edged into the deck
full outside leg, and swept again. Finds Summers at square leg though
full and wide outside off, and he tries to drag a sweep from beyond the stumps. Can't connect
full and wide outside off, and tries to sweep again. But the ball sneaks under his bat
length ball, wide outside off, and the attempted cut is mistimed
one too many! Length ball, very wide outside off, and Anderson skips down the wicket. Can't connect with the cut, and the keeper swipes the bails off
full on leg, and he tries to nudge it towards the leg side. Leading edge takes it to cover
full and fast on leg, and the ball angles further away. Starts off with extras
again! Summers over-correcting. This is full, and very wide outside off stump
full on middle, and angling into his pads. Sohail tries to play this fine, but the ball takes a nick of his pads and goes into the keeper's gloves
length ball angling in, and flicked off his hips to deep midwicket
full and wide outside off, and he reaches forward to drive. Toe-ends it to mid-off
length ball, just wide outside off, and steered to third man
back of a length, just outside off, and guided to the right of third man
back of a length, just outside off, and cut away to deep point for one
full just outside off, and driven away from his body to cover
full on middle, and driven with the bat's open face to wide extra cover
carved! Length ball outside off, but AB rocks back, and slaps this over cover
another one! Length ball outside off again, but AB deposits it to the same place. Muscled over cover for the second boundary in two balls
full just outside off, and driven away from his body to deep extra cover
length ball, wide outside off, and the ball turns away from Sohail. Can't connect with the defensive push
length ball, just outside off, and he pulls to midwicket. Straight to the fielder though
full outside off, and he muscles a driven shot to deep extra cover
back of a length, just outside off, and AB lets it to go through to the keeper. 145kph
length ball on off, and AB takes a few steps forward to pull. Mistimed to the leg side
good length, just outside off, and guided to third man for a single
length ball, wide outside off, and the attempted cut is under-edged into the ground
length ball on leg, and angling across. Guided to third man for one. Hundred for LQ
full on off, and he digs this almost-yorker to midwicket. No one there so Amir needs to run across to get the ball
full on leg, and AB clears his leg to slog. Mistimed, straight back to Amir
golf swing! Full on leg, and AB is done messing around. Clears his front leg, and absolutely clatters a six over midwicket. Crowd goes wiiiild
reverse swept into the air, and short third man ain't missing that. Full on leg, and he had changed his grip quickly. Doesn't manage to ramp it over the infield, and de Villiers has to go
full on off, and the attempted square drive is squirted away to deep point
full on off, and late inswing. Muscled to long on for one
length ball, just outside off, and guided to short third man
length ball, wide outside off, and he flat-bats a shot down to long on
back of a leg on off, and he rides the bounce to pull along the ground to deep midwicket
length ball on off, and guided down to fine leg for a single
back of a length outside off, but angling in. Wiese tries to cut but too close to his body. Through to the keeper
full outside off, and angling further away. Tries to carve a drive over cover, but thick outside edge takes the ball to the keeper instead
muscled over midwicket Length ball, juicy length, and he hammers this for a six
length ball on leg, and mistimed to the leg side
back of a length on off, and he misses the pull. Through to the keeper
nice start to the final over! Full toss, outside off, and the attempted drive is edged past the keeper's right
yorker just outside off, and dug away to point
yorked on middle, and he works this away to square leg for a single
full and wide outside off. Toe-ends a drive to Ingram at wide long-off
full outside off, and the ball dribbles down to long-off. Enough time to take two
full on leg, and tapped down the ground to long-on. Karachi off the mark
length ball, just outside off, and he tries to tap this to cover. Off the bat's top half, and nearly carries to the bowler
that's a biggie! Full on middle, and Munro settles on one knee, before slogging over cow corner
drilled! Full on off, and he clears his front leg, before hammering a straight drive to the long-on boundary
drops the length, short on off, and Munro cuts. Nearly carries to cover, who dives over the ball. Chase for the infielder
fourteen off the over! Slower through the air, length on middle. Muscled to deep midwicket
length ball on middle, and punched off the back foot to cover
full on off, and Munro presses forward to check-drive. Finds the infielder
full on leg, and driven down the ground. Just past the bowler's stumps, and mid-off runs across to intercept
shottt! A classical on-drive, to deposit this full ball on off. Straight to the long-on boundary
length ball, wide outside off, and the cut is under-edged right into the deck
length ball on off, and tapped off the back foot to mid-on
length ball on leg, and the googly goes across Munro. Nudged to the leg side for a single
full just outside off, and turning further away. Driven to cover
full just outside off, and drilled to cover. They're going for a dangerous single, but Wiese's misfield means it's a comfortable run
length ball on leg, and the googly goes away from Munro. Cut to point
full just outside off, and the googly is under-edged into the stumps!
third time lucky! Munro looked sooo uncomfortable. Full on leg, and his inside-out drive goes straight to the diving fielder at mid-off
full on off, and driven to mid-on. Livingstone wants the single, but Babar sends him back
back of a length on off, and punched to mid-on
drilled! Length ball, just outside off, and he crunches a back-foot punch to the cover boundary. Boom!
full just outside off, and driven away from his body to cover. Stopped
length ball, just wide outside off, and guided to third man
slower ball, full on off, and driven to mid-off
full outside off, and the googly squirts inwards. Livingstone tries to defend, but plays down the wrong line
length ball on off, and the googly is whipped to midwicket for a single
Sandeep, you beauty! Nepal are you awake? Full on off, and Babar makes room to drive. Ball spins inwards, and middle stump is broken. Lamcichhane removes the World's No.1 and No.2 T20 batsmen
length ball on middle, and defended off the back foot. Another googly
length ball on leg, and clipped off his pads to square leg
full on off, and spinning away. Punched to cover on this occasion
back of a length on off, and angling in. Defended off the back foot to the leg side
full on off, and driven straight to mid-on. Firmly struck
full just outside off. Livingstone walks across to the off side, before defending
length ball, on off, and punched with the straight bat to the bowler
fifth dot! Classic over from Wiese so far. This was nearly a yorker outside off, and dug away to cover
back of a length just outside off, and tapped off the back foot past Ingram to mid-on
full just outside off, and the googly is paddled to fine leg
length ball on middle, and the googly is cut to deep point
length ball, wide outside off, but turning inwards. Muscled to deep midwicket off the back foot
length ball on off, and turning inwards this time. Punched off the back foot to long off
length ball, wide outside off and turning away. Cut to deep point
full on off, and skidding across Ingram. He opens the bat's face and pushes to deep extra cover
full, wide outside off, and drilled off the front foot to deep extra cover
length ball on off, and the delivery holds it's line. Livingstone tries to punch, but outside edge takes it to cover
ramped over the keeper! Full on off, but Livinstone steps across the stumps, before helping the ball go over the keeper's head
length ball, wide outside off, and angling in. Defended off the back foot
full just outside off, and the ball has been muscled to long-on for a single
full just outside off, and he mistimes a drive to cover
length ball on middle, and skidding inwards. Misses the flick to the leg side. Ball hits his pads, but would definitely have missed the stumps
half-tracker just outside off, and turning further away. Pulled to wide long on
full just outside off, and the googly goes away from Ingram. Tapped off the front foot to mid off
whoa, whoa, whoaa! Half-tracker on off, and he rocks deeeep into his crease, before muscling a pull right beyond the cow-corner boundary
length ball on middle, and he punches off the back foot to wide long on. Fifty for Karachi
length ball, wide outside off, and cut to gully. They scamper across for one
length ball on leg, and turning into his pads. Played fine off his pads, and racing away to the fine-leg boundary
full outside leg, and turning into his body. Nudged off his hips to square leg
length ball on off, and turning inwards. Defended off the back foot to midwicket
length ball on off, and going further away. Forced to reach at it, but manages to cut to point
length ball on off, and the googly is punched to cover off the back foot
full just outside off, and driven to long-on for a walking single
full outside off, and wild turn away from the right-hander. Keeper can't hold on either
full on off, and drilled back to the bowler
back of a length, just wide outside off, and cut to point
back of a length, wide outside off, and pulled towards wide long on! Fielder there can't cut it off
back of a length on off, and Livingstone goes deep into his crease. Pulls with all the power he has, and that's gone over cow corner
full just outside off, and Livingstone's down on one knee to sweep. Struck sooo hard! Races away to the backward square fence
length ball, just outside off, and punched down to long on for a walking single. Eighteen runs
nearly a yorker on off, and drilled to mid on
back of a length on off, and he stays on the back foot. Steered to point
big wicket for Haris! Nearly a yorker on middle, and Ingram tries to play across the line. He misses, and the ball crashes into middle stump. What a delivery

big appeal for lbw! But not given. LQ are reviewing. This was a pinpoint yorker on leg stump that the batsman had no clue about. We only need to see if this hitting the stumps or not. Early signs... it's missing leg stump. Yep. Confirmed. Pitching outside leg anyway. LQ lose their review
glorious! Back of a length on middle, and the new man swivels, and then pulls behind square to the backward-square boundary. Time out
full on middle, and struck back to the bowler
length ball on off, and turning away. Tapped off the front foot
he's still got some tricks up his sleeve! Full outside of, and Livingstone jams his attempted sweep. Ball hits the deck, and rolls onto middle stump. Yasir strikes
length ball on off, and skidding through. Presses forward to defend
waist-high full toss, outside off, and punched to cover. Bowler will feel lucky getting away. Batsman questions the square-leg umpire too
back of a length on off, and hitting the batsman's guts. Non-striker must scamper back
full on off, and the straight drive hits the bowler's ankles! He's fine though, but adrenaline rush must be very high
yorker on leg, and clipped firmly to deep backward square leg. Sharp work by the fielder in the deep
full just outside off, and driven to mid-off for one
full just outside off, and driven through the off side. Good commitment from Sohail at wide mid-off, diving across his left to intercept
length ball just outside off, and Iftikhar tries to drive. Misses, and the ball goes past his outside edge
pressure released! Back of a length on off, and angling in. Iftikhar stays deep in his crease, and muscles a pull over square leg
length ball on off, and he goes for a wild swing. Mistimes the slog to deep midwicket
overpiched just outside off, and he toe-ends a drive to cover

whoa, important moment in the game! Full just outside off, and drilled to cover. Quick pick-up-and-throw from the fielder, and the throw's been aimed at the keeper's end. Full-stretched dive from the batsman may have saved him. Yup.
back of a length just outside off, and punched to mid off. Fielder slides across the ground and gets a hand to it. Long-on cleans up
slower ball, full just outside off. Tries to guide a shot to point, but the ball hits the inside of his bat
just what LQ needed! Experience counts for something, doesn't it?! Back of a length on off, and he's pulled this straight to short midwicket. Rizwan can't believe he's picked the fielder
full and wide outside off, and driven away from his body to deep extra cover. Enough time to jog back for the second
slower ball, full on off, and defended with gentle hands, back to Wiese
length ball ,wide outside off, and slapped to deep point. Hundred for Karachi
slower ball, yorker on off, and he inside-edges a shot onto his pads
full on off, and he drives. Toe-ends the shot to Fakhar at short cover
length ball angling across, and he guides a cut to deep point
full on off, and he mistimes a square drive to the off side. Two fielders congregate to clean up
length ball, just outside off, and angling away. Cut square - but with no real power - to point, who dives across the ground to stop the ball
whoa, where did that come from! Length ball, right in the slot on off stump, and Iftikhar has smacked the leather out of this ball. Into the stands beyond midwicket
good comeback from Haris. Yorker just outside off, and dug away to cover
oh dear, Aizaz! Chest-high full toss, wide outside off, and he guides a cut shot straight to the deep-point boundary. Not what LQ needed!
another one! That makes life easy for Karachi. Captain marvelous for Karachi doing the job. It was full on middle, and he comfortably clips a shot over to the square-leg boundary
length ball angling in, and tucked off his hips to square leg
slower ball yorker on middle. Worked away to midwicket for a quick one
full on middle, and nudged off his boots to deep midwicket
slower ball, too wide outside off, and Cheema has been slapped to the point boundary! What a cameo this is
yorker on off, and toe-ended to cover. Cheema isn't happy. A massively expensive over
overpitched on middle, and drilled down the ground to long-on. AB can't prevent the second run though
full on middle, and once again, driven to long on
yorker on off, and he inside-edges a shot onto his pads. Ball rolls away to cover as the batsman scamper across for one

low full toss on leg, and nudged to midwicket. They want a single, but quick fielding from Fakhar at midwicket ensures they don't. But wait! He gets a direct-hit at the bowler's end, and Imad Wasim hasn't grounded his bat, but no one appeals. Imad survives, when he should've been walking back to the pavilion. #brainfade
full and wide outside off stump. Flat-batted to mid-on for a walking single
full and wide outside off, and he cuts this away from his body to deep point
Karachi Kings win! Length ball outside off, and the cut goes to point. They take the single, but overthrows from the fielder means Karachi Kings can run across for the second
